title.rendered: The National Data Management Center for Health has conducted a workshop on costing of 10-year Strategic Plan Management (SPM)

content.rendered:
The NDMC is currently conducting 10 years costing of its strategic plan management. The EPHI has five strategic objectives. One of the five strategic objectives focus on the activities of the center which is aimed at enhancing digital health data science, analytics and information system.

This strategic objective is further divided into four strategic directions which are being conducted by the center’s four case teams.

The representative of all the four case teams in collaboration with the Program Plan and Monitoring and Evaluation Directorate successfully conducted the workshop. We thank all the participants who contributed to the complementation of the workshop on SPM costing.
